name: Chaincubesnek
description:
Game made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1. with the theme "Stronger Together".

Goal is to survive as long as you can. Protect the center node from approaching enemies by whipping them to oblivion with your tail and collect powerups once you beat enough enemies. You can only damage enemies with your tail!

Watch out for your tail segments though as they will take damage and only heal back after being detached.

Controls:

WASD for movement

Space to manually detach last tail segment

Developed by a single-person team. All code, art and audio by Ari L. Music "Harmful or Fatal" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 4.0 License http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

Font from kenney.nl
